repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: ILR School Proposal for a Working Women's Institute for Research and Education
did.abstract: "Proposal for a Working Women's Institute for Research and Education as part of the New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations, Cornell University," submitted by Barbara Wertheimer and Anne Nelson of the Working Women's Program for Research and Education, December 20, 1976.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a "Proposal for a Working Women's Institute for Research and Education as part of the New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations, Cornell University," submitted by Barbara Wertheimer and Anne Nelson of the Working Women's Program for Research and Education, December 20, 1976.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: ILR School Proposal for a Working Women's Institute for Research and Education #/3099m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
